products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout scarlet red panel blind in red. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This bold, scarlet red panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.This red panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: db-pan0217 fabric colour: scarlet red material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout ruby red panel blind in red. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their ruby red bella blackout panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product id: db-pan0245 fabric colour: ruby red material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
